banner.message: Find the perfect place to bring your ideas to life

about.title: Why Choose Cenárioz
about.subTitle: Need a space to bring your ideas to life? We can help you find the perfect place to rent.

card1.title: Easy Budgeting
card1.subTitle: Book your set and pay per hour, with no hidden fees for overtime.

card2.title: Experienced Hosts
card2.subTitle: Connect with experienced owners to discuss studios, technical specifications, and talent accommodations before the shoot.

card3.title: Infinite Possibilities
card3.subTitle: Find everything from professionally equipped studios to unconventional rooms and residences.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.session1: Cenárioz is an online platform that connects property owners with renters looking to film or host events in their spaces. The platform allows renters to search for filming locations, communicate with owners, and easily make payments, all in one place.
mission.session2: The main goal of Cenárioz is to provide renters with a platform to easily find and book unique filming locations and event spaces in a more affordable way. Additionally, the platform offers property owners a new opportunity to showcase their properties and earn additional income.

enum.parking_spots: {value} parking spots: Street parking available or parking structure nearby. Please confirm with the host.
